metadata.title: Custom Accessories 11159 Compass, Clock and Thermometer Combo
description: Custom Accessories all-in-one portable compass, clock and thermometer combo.. Custom Accessories, the leader in automotive aftermarket accessories, is a "one-stop-shop" for all your automotive needs. From interior accessories, exterior accessories, car care, steering wheel covers, compasses, tire gauges, air compressors, car organization, car comfort, and countless others, Custom Accessories has it all!
